oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Out on the Porch
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In this photograph, an African American man and woman can be seen standing on the front porch of a home. A man carrying a satchel has his back to the camera. The location of the photograph is unidentified.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Earl S. Miers River Photograph Collection
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Women; Men; Buildings
